mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (body, article_id, author_id, created_at) VALUES (#{body}, #{articleId}, #{authorId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.body, c.article_id, c.author_id, c.created_at, u.username as author_username, u.email as author_email, u.bio as author_bio, u.image as author_image FROM comments c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.author_id = u.id WHERE c.id = #{id}

SELECT c.id, c.body, c.article_id, c.author_id, c.created_at, u.username as author_username, u.email as author_email, u.bio as author_bio, u.image as author_image FROM comments c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.author_id = u.id LEFT JOIN articles a ON c.article_id = a.id WHERE a.slug = #{articleSlug} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comments c LEFT JOIN articles a ON c.article_id = a.id WHERE a.slug = #{articleSlug}
